resources.string:
Today you are starting your journey of becoming the person you want to see in the mirror.

Just stay focused, and don't give up.
\100 days might seem like a long period, but in fact it's not. Once it's over, you will like your self so much that you will make this a lifetime habit. 100 days for a lifetime seems like a nice trade. 

 Winners and losers both keep trying, but winners always finish what they started, and losers always find excuse and give up before the finish line.
You are a winner!
